scripts.rectangular: cd node_modules/rectangular && rm -rf tmp && mkdir tmp && cp .envrc .env && . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm i 6.10 && nvm use && npm i && cd ../../
scripts.setup: npm run rectangular && cp .envrc .env && . ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm i 6.10 && nvm use && npm i --force
scripts.test: npm run compile && node_modules/.bin/karma start karma.conf.js
